trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <see cref="E:System.Xml.XmlDocument.NodeChanged" />, <see cref="E:System.Xml.XmlDocument.NodeChanging" />, <see cref="E:System.Xml.XmlDocument.NodeInserted" />, <see cref="E:System.Xml.XmlDocument.NodeInserting" />, <see cref="E:System.Xml.XmlDocument.NodeRemoved" /> and <see cref="E:System.Xml.XmlDocument.NodeRemoving" /> events.
trans-unit.target: 提供以下事件的数据：<see cref="E:System.Xml.XmlDocument.NodeChanged" />、<see cref="E:System.Xml.XmlDocument.NodeChanging" />、<see cref="E:System.Xml.XmlDocument.NodeInserted" />、<see cref="E:System.Xml.XmlDocument.NodeInserting" />、<see cref="E:System.Xml.XmlDocument.NodeRemoved" /> 和 <see cref="E:System.Xml.XmlDocument.NodeRemoving" />。

trans-unit.source: The following C# code shows how to use the event handler.
trans-unit.target: 下面的 C# 代码演示如何使用事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: If an operation is comprised of multiple actions, it results in multiple events.
trans-unit.target: 如果操作组成多个操作，这会导致多个事件。

trans-unit.source: For example, an <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.AppendChild%2A> call may have to remove the node being appended from its previous parent.
trans-unit.target: 例如，<xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.AppendChild%2A>调用可能需要移除从其上一个父级追加的节点。

trans-unit.source: In this case you will see a `NodeRemoved` event followed by a `NodeInserted` event.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，你将看到`NodeRemoved`事件跟`NodeInserted`事件。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNode" /> that generated the event.
trans-unit.target: 生成事件的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNode" />。

trans-unit.source: The old parent <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNode" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNode" /> that generated the event.
trans-unit.target: 生成了该事件的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNode" /> 的旧父级 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNode" />。

trans-unit.source: The new parent <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNode" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNode" /> that generated the event.
trans-unit.target: 生成了该事件的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNode" /> 的新父级 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNode" />。

trans-unit.source: The old value of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNode" /> that generated the event.
trans-unit.target: 生成了该事件的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNode" /> 的旧值。

trans-unit.source: The new value of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNode" /> that generated the event.
trans-unit.target: 生成了该事件的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNode" /> 的新值。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNodeChangedAction" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNodeChangedAction" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNodeChangedEventArgs" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNodeChangedEventArgs" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating what type of node change event is occurring.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示正在发生哪种类型的节点更改事件。

trans-unit.source: An <see langword="XmlNodeChangedAction" /> value describing the node change event.
trans-unit.target: 描述节点更改事件的 <see langword="XmlNodeChangedAction" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: <list type="table"><listheader><term> XmlNodeChangedAction Value
trans-unit.target: <list type="table"><listheader><term> XmlNodeChangedAction 值

trans-unit.source: </term><description> Description
trans-unit.target: </term><description> 描述

trans-unit.source: </description></listheader><item><term> Insert
trans-unit.target: </description></listheader><item><term> 插入

trans-unit.source: </term><description> A node has been or will be inserted.
trans-unit.target: </term><description> 已或将插入的节点。

trans-unit.source: </description></item><item><term> Remove
trans-unit.target: </description></item><item><term> 删除

trans-unit.source: </term><description> A node has been or will be removed.
trans-unit.target: </term><description> 节点已经，或将被删除。

trans-unit.source: </description></item><item><term> Change
trans-unit.target: </description></item><item><term> 更改

trans-unit.source: </term><description> A node has been or will be changed.
trans-unit.target: </term><description> 节点已被，或将会更改。

trans-unit.source: The <see langword="Action" /> value does not differentiate between when the event occurred (before or after).
trans-unit.target: <see langword="Action" /> 值不区分事件何时发生（之前或之后）。

trans-unit.source: You can create separate event handlers to handle both instances.
trans-unit.target: 您可以创建单独的事件处理程序来处理两种情况。

trans-unit.source: Gets the value of the <see cref="P:System.Xml.XmlNode.ParentNode" /> after the operation completes.
trans-unit.target: 获取操作完成后 <see cref="P:System.Xml.XmlNode.ParentNode" /> 的值。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <see langword="ParentNode" /> after the operation completes.
trans-unit.target: 操作完成后 <see langword="ParentNode" /> 的值。

trans-unit.source: This property returns <see langword="null" /> if the node is being removed.
trans-unit.target: 如果节点正被移除，此属性返回 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: For attribute nodes this property returns the <see cref="P:System.Xml.XmlAttribute.OwnerElement" />.
trans-unit.target: 对于特性节点，此属性返回 <see cref="P:System.Xml.XmlAttribute.OwnerElement" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the new value of the node.
trans-unit.target: 获取节点的新值。

trans-unit.source: The new value of the node.
trans-unit.target: 节点的新值。

trans-unit.source: This property returns <see langword="null" /> if the node is neither an attribute nor a text node, or if the node is being removed.
trans-unit.target: 如果节点既不是特性节点也不是文本节点，或者节点要被移除，则此属性将返回 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: If called in a <see cref="E:System.Xml.XmlDocument.NodeChanging" /> event, <see langword="NewValue" /> returns the value of the node if the change is successful.
trans-unit.target: 如果在 <see cref="E:System.Xml.XmlDocument.NodeChanging" /> 事件中调用 <see langword="NewValue" />，则在更改成功后返回节点的值。

trans-unit.source: If called in a <see cref="E:System.Xml.XmlDocument.NodeChanged" /> event, <see langword="NewValue" /> returns the current value of the node.
trans-unit.target: 如果在 <see cref="E:System.Xml.XmlDocument.NodeChanged" /> 事件中调用 <see langword="NewValue" />，将返回节点的当前值。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNode" /> that is being added, removed or changed.
trans-unit.target: 获取正被添加、移除或更改的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNode" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see langword="XmlNode" /> that is being added, removed or changed; this property never returns <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 正被添加、移除或更改的 <see langword="XmlNode" />；此属性从不返回 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the value of the <see cref="P:System.Xml.XmlNode.ParentNode" /> before the operation began.
trans-unit.target: 获取操作开始前的 <see cref="P:System.Xml.XmlNode.ParentNode" /> 的值。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <see langword="ParentNode" /> before the operation began.
trans-unit.target: 操作开始前 <see langword="ParentNode" /> 的值。

trans-unit.source: This property returns <see langword="null" /> if the node did not have a parent.
trans-unit.target: 如果节点不具有父级，则此属性返回 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: For attribute nodes this property returns the <see cref="P:System.Xml.XmlAttribute.OwnerElement" />.
trans-unit.target: 对于特性节点，此属性返回 <see cref="P:System.Xml.XmlAttribute.OwnerElement" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the original value of the node.
trans-unit.target: 获取节点的原始值。

trans-unit.source: The original value of the node.
trans-unit.target: 节点的原始值。

trans-unit.source: This property returns <see langword="null" /> if the node is neither an attribute nor a text node, or if the node is being inserted.
trans-unit.target: 如果节点既不是特性节点也不是文本节点，或者节点要被插入，此属性将返回 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: If called in a <see cref="E:System.Xml.XmlDocument.NodeChanging" /> event, <see langword="OldValue" /> returns the current value of the node that will be replaced if the change is successful.
trans-unit.target: 如果在 <see cref="E:System.Xml.XmlDocument.NodeChanging" /> 事件中调用 <see langword="OldValue" />，则在更改成功后返回将被替换的节点的当前值。

trans-unit.source: If called in a <see cref="E:System.Xml.XmlDocument.NodeChanged" /> event, <see langword="OldValue" /> returns the value of node prior to the change.
trans-unit.target: 如果在 <see cref="E:System.Xml.XmlDocument.NodeChanged" /> 事件中调用 <see langword="OldValue" />，则将返回更改前节点的值。
